content:
The concept of time was only affecting their bodies, their minds been long set free.
    Peering through the veil of reality they did not look, they surrendered.
    A fleeting image, a sudden glimpse, ever eluding.
    It could take days or weeks, months or years but those who got granted their vision would never forgetâ€¦
title: Visions of the Grove
author: Visions
